Posts.Content: Quote: Originally Posted by worryworttx Have just a few quesitons...about a year ago I had a benign tumor removed from my breat...because of bloody type discharge...it was not pure blood, however I haven't had a problem until now...there is pure blood coming out of my breat when I express it or by itself while I am sleeping. What should I do...I just don't want anymore bad news.?. Thanks for you replies and responses... bec Hello, When was your last mamagram? I would be contacting my doctor and try to get in.To be on the safe side.Maybe that tumor could have possibly came back. Good Luck! Cheryl
Posts.Title: Pure Blood Discharge

Posts.Content: Quote: Originally Posted by BioAdoptMom3 OK, I just had my second annual, routine mammogram last week and today I got a letter stating that I needed to call my doctor to have something suspicious further investigated. It did state that cancer is not likely in cases like these, but it does warrent further examination. I will call the doctor in the morning. I am worried. I guess I shouldn't be yet, but can't help but be a bit concerned. I am 45 years old. I have never dealt with anything like this before. I guess my questions are: Has anyone else on here gotten a letter like this? If so, what was the outcome? Does anyone have any idea what the next step might be? TIA! Nancy I wouldnt worry just yet I believe that it is something little. My sister has these things on her breast that her letter said the samre thing. They were like cyst. Sometimes they call you back in to do another mamagram or even a ultrasound.Please dont worry so much. Let me know.Good Luck! Cheryl
Posts.Title: Help! Letter about Mammogram!
